articles.description: Australia Post and Woolworths among 26 new Sydney sites exposed to Covid-19
articles.content:
NSW Health has issued another long list of exposure sites in a late night update on Monday.More than 20 close contact venues were identified, including a number of bus routes and a medical centre.

articles.author: Michael Smith
articles.title: China's post-pandemic recovery shows signs of faltering - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: An easing of lending policies and an expected slowdown in second-quarter GDP growth are the latest signs the economic rebound is softening.
articles.content: The RRR [reserve requirement ratio] cut is the first clear sign that, with the withdrawal of last years stimulus essentially complete, the focus of policymakers is shifting towards managing structura… [+3730 chars]
